gameplayModule.title: WE ARE VALORANT
gameplayModule.subtitle: DEFY THE LIMITS
gameplayModule.description: Blend your style and experience on a global, competitive stage. You have 13 rounds to attack and defend your side using sharp gunplay and tactical abilities. And, with one life per-round, you'll need to think faster than your opponent if you want to survive. Take on foes across Competitive and Unranked modes as well as Deathmatch and Spike Rush.

mapsModule.description: Each map is a playground to showcase your creative thinking. Purpose-built for team strategies, spectacular plays, and clutch moments. Make the play others will imitate for years to come.
mapsModule.subtitle: FIGHT AROUND THE WORLD
mapsModule.title: YOUR MAPS

agentsModule.title: YOUR AGENTS
agentsModule.subtitle: CREATIVITY IS YOUR GREATEST WEAPON.
agentsModule.description: More than guns and bullets, you’ll choose an Agent armed with adaptive, swift, and lethal abilities that create opportunities to let your gunplay shine. No two Agents play alike, just as no two highlight reels will look the same.

opengraph.description: Riot Games presents VALORANT: a 5v5 character-based tactical FPS where precise gunplay meets unique agent abilities. Learn about VALORANT and its stylish cast
opengraph.title: VALORANT: Riot Games’ competitive 5v5 character-based tactical shooter

twitter.title: VALORANT: Riot Games’ competitive 5v5 character-based tactical shooter
